artist: After Guido Reni; John Corner; Published by Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London
description: self portrait of Guido Reni turned right, looking out toward viewer; wearing large brim hat; flat white collar on jacket; below portrait his painting of Venus attired by the Graces; all enclosed in a rectangular frame
